txt.en: The spring wine is greatly appreciated
Pretty Parched Party-goers!
Carry spring wine to the south-west table
Jugs of spring wine can be found on the tables in the centre of the Festival Grounds.\n\nArn Bulrush asked you to deliver jugs of spring wine to tables on the outskirts of the Grounds.

'I just walked around the Festival Grounds and do you know what I saw? Why, my disappointed eyes beheld parched party-goers everywhere I turned! No Spring Festival can be properly enjoyed without the delightful notes of a smooth spring wine! I have some Spring Leaves for you if you will pick up jugs of spring wine from the tables in the centre of the Festival Grounds and deliver them to tables on the outskirts, [placeholder]!'
Pick up some wine for the south-east table
The spring wine is always appreciated
Jugs of spring wine can be found on the tables in the centre of the Festival Grounds.\n\nArn Bulrush asked you to deliver jugs of spring wine to tables on the outskirts of the Grounds.
Pick up some wine for the north-east table
Pick up some wine for the south-east table
They'll whine for wine if you're not more careful!

Arn Bulrush is concerned that the party-goers at this year's Spring Festival have become parched and will not enjoy his various activities unless their refreshments are refreshed.

<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
Arn Bulrush is waiting to hear if your wine deliveries brought refreshment to the parched partygoers.
The spring wine is much appreciated
They'll whine for wine if you're not more careful!
The spring wine is much appreciated
They'll whine for wine if you're not more careful!
Jugs of spring wine can be found on the tables in the centre of the Festival Grounds.\n\nArn Bulrush asked you to deliver jugs of spring wine to tables on the outskirts of the Grounds.

'I can tell that your deliveries were met with much appreciation, [placeholder]! You earned these Spring Leaves, and at the same time put my mind at ease!\n\n'Oh, I hope everyone is having a good time. When the party-goers find they are once again parched there will always be a need for someone willing to bring them what they need, so check back with me from time to time, my useful friend!'
They'll whine for wine if you're not more careful!
Carry spring wine to the south-east table
Carry spring wine to the north-east table, by the horses
Pick up some wine for the south-west table
Carry spring wine to the south-east table
Talk to Arn Bulrush at the Festival Grounds
